[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Print {
            print: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 7,
                position: 6,
            },
            value: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 13,
                            position: 12,
                        },
                        name: "$foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 17,
                position: 16,
            },
        ),
    },
]
